summary: Phase 1 Access Transparency testing complete. All backend tests (12/12) passed. All frontend features verified working correctly: access badges on network cards, Visible To header section, Access tab (renamed from Settings), Last Updated info display, audit log creation, and access_summary_cache population.

backend_api: GET /api/v3/networks returns visibility_mode for each network
GET /api/v3/networks returns access_summary_cache for restricted networks
PUT /api/v3/networks/{id}/access-control clears access_summary_cache for brand_based mode
PUT /api/v3/networks/{id}/access-control creates audit log in network_access_audit_logs collection
Audit log tracks added_user_ids and added_user_names
GET /api/v3/networks/{id}/access-control returns access_updated_by with user info
GET /api/v3/networks/{id}/access-audit-logs requires admin role (401/403 without auth)
GET /api/v3/networks/{id}/access-audit-logs returns list of logs with total count
Audit log entries have correct structure (id, event_type, network_id, changed_by, etc.)
frontend_ui: Network cards show access badge with correct mode (Restricted/Brand Based/Public)
Restricted network badge shows lock icon with amber styling
Brand Based network badge shows users icon with zinc styling
Network detail header shows 'Visible To:' section with visibility mode
Header shows 'Super Admin only' when restricted with no allowed users
Access tab exists (renamed from Settings) with data-testid='access-tab'
Old 'Settings' tab has been correctly renamed to 'Access'
NetworkAccessSettings component loads in Access tab with data-testid='network-access-settings'
Visibility mode options (Brand Based, Restricted, Public) visible and clickable
Save Access Settings button saves changes
'Last Updated' section shows date and user who made changes after save
Clicking header 'Visible To' section navigates to Access tab

critical_code_review_comments: build_access_summary_cache() correctly fetches first 3 user names and total count
update_network_access_control() properly creates audit log entry with all required fields
access_updated_at and access_updated_by correctly stored in network document on save
Frontend getAccessBadge() helper correctly renders different badge styles based on visibility_mode
Header 'Visible To' section correctly shows user count and names for restricted mode
Access tab properly renamed from Settings - no duplicate tabs exist
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing test network (76e067db-60ba-4e3b-a949-b3229dc1c652).
